answers.answer: Let your doctor know immediately.  You need to be seen and evaluated right away.  How has your blood pressure been?  Headaches?  Swelling?Please call your doctor and describe your symptoms at once.
I am not an expert or anything but it does sound like the symptoms could be preeclampsia...which is dangerous to both mom and baby. You really need to see your doctor.

question: I am 33 weeks pregnant. I have been having parts of my body jerk at time. My shoulders and legs are most effected. It doesn't hurt, but it does freak me out. Is this normal? I also have been having a bloated, lots of pressure feeling from my belly button all the way to my "women area". I also see tiny strobe light things at times even when not moving. This is my second pregnancy. I had nothing like this with my first. Please let me know what you think. Thank you.
title: 33 weeks pregnant with some questions
